languages.text: "Мы слишком привязаны к этой жизни, к ограниченности наших слабых тел, к близорукости наших едва-едва зрячих глаз. Это все столь ничтожно... настоящее будущее лежит вне {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}реального мира{/g}. И прорваться к нему можно только через очистительную жертву. Понимаешь?"

"We are too attached to this life, to the limitations of our weak bodies, to the short-sightedness of our eyes that can scarcely see. It is all so insignificant... The true future lies beyond {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}. And the only way to reach it is through a cleansing sacrifice. Do you understand?"
languages.original_text: "Мы слишком привязаны к этой жизни, к ограниченности наших слабых тел, к близорукости наших едва-едва зрячих глаз. Это все столь ничтожно... настоящее будущее лежит вне {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}реального мира{/g}. И прорваться к нему можно только через очистительную жертву. Понимаешь?"

traits.locale_text: "We are too attached to this life, to the limitations of our weak bodies, to the short-sightedness of our eyes that can barely see anything. It is all so insignificant... The true future lies beyond realspace. And the only way to reach it is through a cleansing sacrifice. Do you understand?"

"We are too attached to this life, to the limitations of our weak bodies, to the short-sightedness of our eyes that can barely see anything. It is all so insignificant... The true future lies beyond realspace. And the only way to reach it is through a cleansing sacrifice. Do you understand?"

"We are too attached to this life, to the limitations of our weak bodies, to the short-sightedness of our eyes that can scarcely see. It is all so insignificant... The true future lies beyond realspace. And the only way to reach it is through a cleansing sacrifice. Do you understand?"

"We are too attached to this life, to the limitations of our weak bodies, to the short-sightedness of our eyes that can scarcely see. It is all so insignificant... The true future lies beyond {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}. And the only way to reach it is through a cleansing sacrifice. Do you understand?"

languages.text: “我们太执着于眼下的生命，执着于孱弱的身体带来的局限，执着于我们目不视物的双眼带来的短视。这世上的一切都如此微不足道……真正的未来位于{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}真实世界{/g}之外，而抵达它的唯一途径，就是通过纯洁的牺牲。你能明白吗？”
languages.original_text: "We are too attached to this life, to the limitations of our weak bodies, to the short-sightedness of our eyes that can scarcely see. It is all so insignificant... The true future lies beyond {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}. And the only way to reach it is through a cleansing sacrifice. Do you understand?"

traits.locale_text: “我们太执着于眼下的生命，执着于孱弱的身体带来的局限，执着于我们目不视物的双眼带来的短视。这世上的一切都如此微不足道……真正的未来位于{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}真实世界{/g}之外，而抵达它的唯一途径，就是通过纯洁的牺牲。你能明白吗？”

languages.text: 「我らはこの生に、脆弱な肉体の限界に、ほとんど見通せぬ眼に、あまりにも執着しすぎている。すべては些事…真の未来は、{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}リアルスペース{/g}の彼方にあるのだ。そしてそこに到達する唯一の方法は、清らかな犠牲のみなのだ。わかるか？」
languages.original_text: "We are too attached to this life, to the limitations of our weak bodies, to the short-sightedness of our eyes that can scarcely see. It is all so insignificant... The true future lies beyond {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}. And the only way to reach it is through a cleansing sacrifice. Do you understand?"

traits.locale_text: 「我らはこの生に、脆弱な肉体の限界に、ほとんど見通せぬ眼に、あまりにも執着しすぎている。すべては些事…真の未来は、{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}リアルスペース{/g}の彼方にあるのだ。そしてそこに到達する唯一の方法は、清らかな犠牲のみなのだ。わかるか？
「我らはこの生に、脆弱な肉体の限界に、ほとんど見通せぬ眼に、あまりにも執着しすぎている。すべては些事…真の未来は、{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}リアルスペース{/g}の彼方にあるのだ。そしてそこに到達する唯一の方法は、清らかな犠牲のみなのだ。わかるか？」

languages.text: "Wir hängen zu sehr an diesem Leben, an den Grenzen unserer schwachen Körper, an unserer Kurzsichtigkeit, die verhindert, dass wir überhaupt richtig sehen. Das ist alles so unbedeutend ... Die wahre Zukunft liegt jenseits des {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}Realraums{/g}. Und zu erreichen ist sie nur durch ein reinigendes Opfer. Versteht Ihr?"
languages.original_text: "We are too attached to this life, to the limitations of our weak bodies, to the short-sightedness of our eyes that can scarcely see. It is all so insignificant... The true future lies beyond {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}. And the only way to reach it is through a cleansing sacrifice. Do you understand?"

traits.locale_text: "Wir hängen zu sehr an diesem Leben, an den Grenzen unserer schwachen Körper, an unserer Kurzsichtigkeit, die verhindert, dass wir überhaupt richtig sehen. Das ist alles so unbedeutend ... Die wahre Zukunft liegt jenseits des {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}Realraums{/g}. Und zu erreichen ist sie nur durch ein reinigendes Opfer. Versteht Ihr?"

languages.text: « Nous sommes trop accrochés à cette vie, aux limitations de nos frêles organismes, à la médiocrité de notre vision étriquée. Tout cela est tellement insignifiant... Le véritable avenir se trouve au-delà de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}espace réel{/g}. Et c'est uniquement par le sacrifice purificateur que nous parviendrons à l'atteindre. Comprenez-vous ? »
languages.original_text: "We are too attached to this life, to the limitations of our weak bodies, to the short-sightedness of our eyes that can scarcely see. It is all so insignificant... The true future lies beyond {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}. And the only way to reach it is through a cleansing sacrifice. Do you understand?"

traits.locale_text: « Nous sommes trop accrochés à cette vie, aux limitations de nos frêles organismes, à la médiocrité de notre vision étriquée. Tout cela est tellement insignifiant... Le véritable avenir se trouve au-delà de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}espace réel{/g}. Et c'est uniquement par le sacrifice purificateur que nous parviendrons à l'atteindre. Comprenez-vous ? »

languages.text: «Estamos demasiado apegados a esta vida, a las limitaciones de nuestros cuerpos débiles, a la flaqueza de nuestros ojos casi ciegos. Todo es tan insignificante... El auténtico futuro está más allá del {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}espacio real{/g}. Y la única forma de alcanzarlo es con un sacrificio de purificación. ¿Lo entiendes?».
languages.original_text: "We are too attached to this life, to the limitations of our weak bodies, to the short-sightedness of our eyes that can scarcely see. It is all so insignificant... The true future lies beyond {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}. And the only way to reach it is through a cleansing sacrifice. Do you understand?"

traits.locale_text: «Estamos demasiado apegados a esta vida, a las limitaciones de nuestros cuerpos débiles, a la flaqueza de nuestros ojos casi ciegos. Todo es tan insignificante... El auténtico futuro está más allá del {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}espacio real{/g}. Y la única forma de alcanzarlo es con un sacrificio de purificación. ¿Lo entiendes?».

languages.text: "Bu hayata, zayıf bedenlerimizin sınırlarına, zar zor görebilen gözlerimizin dar görüşlülüğüne çok bağlıyız. Bunların hepsi öyle önemsiz ki... Hakiki gelecek, {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}gerçekuzayın{/g} ötesinde yatıyor. Ona ulaşmanın tek yolu da arındırıcı bir fedakârlıktan geçiyor. Anlıyor musun?"
languages.original_text: "We are too attached to this life, to the limitations of our weak bodies, to the short-sightedness of our eyes that can scarcely see. It is all so insignificant... The true future lies beyond {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}. And the only way to reach it is through a cleansing sacrifice. Do you understand?"
